subject: Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Sweetnorthernsaint is the wise-guy pick for the 132d running of America's most famous race, much to the chagrin of his trainer, Mike Trombetta.
snippet: Sweetnorthernsaint is the wise-guy pick for the 132d running of America's most famous race, much to the chagrin of his trainer, Mike Trombetta.
